title: LOL Launcher Doesn't Work
body:
LOL launcher button just goes goes grey after clicking and nothing happens. occasionally an EULA pops up but never goes to login
I run as admin, have reinstalled and repaired, have great computer capability and decent internet. was just wondering if anyone found or has discovered an answer to this issue

replies.body: It sounds like you may be having a connection issue failing to establish comms with the authentication server, which is one reason the eula keeps popping up.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up and logged in.  Hope that helps!
